events.name: Inspiring Live Talk Show by Falguni Vasvada
events.description: We were honored to host Dr. Vasavada, Associate Professor and Chairperson of Online Programs at MICA, for an enlightening talk show at Ahmedabad University. Dr. Vasavada shared her insights and experiences on women's empowerment, gender issues, and combating body shaming, aligning with our values of inclusivity and equity. Attendees had the unique opportunity to interact with a distinguished marketing and advertising expert, gaining valuable takeaways from her inspiring journey.

events.name: Billion Reasons to Build
events.description: IEEE Ahmedabad University branch collaborated with Push Protocol to host this incredible event. The full day event was a whirlwind of innovation and inspiration. The energy of over 450 students at the event was electrifying and their passion for technology is contagious and itâ€™s the driving force for our tech future.

events.name: Two-Wheeler Safety and Mobility Technologies
events.description: Wheeler Safety & Mobility Technology an event organised by IEEE ITSS and Ahmedabad University where Experts of various fields had insightful talks, discussions on innovative approaches and ideas to improve road safety.

events.name: The Importance of Soft Skills
events.description:
"The Importance of Soft Skills" by renowned Image Coach and NLP Master Practitioner, Sandhya Anantani included the following:
	(1) Talk on soft skills
	(2) Hands on activities
	(3) Personal Interaction
